summary: A minimal dwelling hidden in Whiterun\'s sewers
descriptionHtml:
Attention: this is a testing version. Use at your own risk. This mod may be incompatible with any mod that alters the WhiterunExterior01 cell, where the entrance is located.

--------

[b]About[/b]

As we thieves, bandits, and assassins know, sometimes you need a place to lie low for awhile, and to hide certain things that you don\'t want your spouse (or the city guards!) to find. That\'s exactly why a certain rogue Breton built this hideout underneath Whiterun.

--------

[b]Location[/b] 

The entrance is on the left side of the sewer grate along the city wall near Whiterun Stables (and there is also a map marker that you can fast travel to).

--------

[b]Features[/b]

Crafting: cooking spit, enchanting table, alchemy lab, smelter, anvil (forge), armor bench, grinding wheel

Containers: 4 safes, Armor wardrobe, Clothes wardrobe, Alchemy chest, Potions chest, Enchanting chest, Smithing chest, Archery chest, Melee weapons chest, Magic chest, Food barrel, Beverage barrel

Furniture: one bed (for now)

--------

[Bugs]

Followers won\'t follow you inside, but they will be waiting for you outside when you leave. You probably want to maintain plausible deniability for them anyhow.

Feel free to report any other problems or requests.
author: dbbolton
